Initial release of Surge v1.0.0

Surge is a high-performance, actor-based load testing framework for .NET,
extracted from xUnitV3LoadFramework to provide a framework-agnostic core.

- Hybrid execution mode supporting 100k+ concurrent operations
- Comprehensive performance metrics (latency percentiles, throughput)
- Three termination modes for precise control
- Graceful shutdown with configurable timeouts
- Framework-agnostic design (use with xUnit, NUnit, MSTest, or standalone)

This release includes:
- Complete source code migration from xUnitV3LoadFramework.LoadRunnerCore
- Namespace migration: xUnitV3LoadFramework.LoadRunnerCore.* â†’ Surge.*
- 15 source files across Actors, Configuration, Messages, Models, Runner

- CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and publishing
- .NET 8.0 target framework with C# 12

For xUnit v3 integration, see Surge.xUnit (coming soon).

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
